Name: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Dog's Language
Description: You meet Xuanyin again, who is having fun with some puppies...
QuestDesc: You meet Xuanyin again, who is having fun with some puppies...

Conditions.PreQuestName: Listen to Animals' Words: Translation of Rabbit's Language

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hi, {PlayerName}, how's it going?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm great. Rare to meet you in Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha, true. After all, most of my research subjects are out in the wilderness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I feel a bit strange to rejoin a civilized society after roughing it out in the field. I prefer to play with dogs rather than deal with other people.

Options.PlotLineKey: So it's the Dog Translation Module this time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, they're all my old friends, so it won't take too long to collect data as before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See this pit bull? Its white eyebrows are pretty cute, huh? That's why I call it "Heroplay".

Options.PlotLineKey: Is there a cause-and-effect relationship in this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hahaha, actually, it's because it loves to hang out near the entrance of the Jinzhou Theater.

Dialogues.Speaker: "Hero Play"
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Woof, woof, woof.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like it has something to say. Let's install the translation module and check it out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Bulldogs (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's play! Let's play!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speedydogs (Translation)
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Happy! Happy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhuxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where have the kittens gone? Can't find any lately. Days without fluffy foot pads are so grueling... lucky the puppies are here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Dogs are not a "substitute" for cats.

Dialogues.Speaker: Zhuxi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know! I love them both!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fine, as long as you're happy.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like the thing the dogs are most concerned about is their two-legged friends.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some dogs, after training, can take on complex tasks. That's the original purpose of humans domesticating them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's surprising that dogs and wolves share the same origin but are different. Dogs lack the ferocity of wolves, you know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They've established a deeper connection with humans.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wolves hunt in packs in the wilderness, whereas dogs find a home in human households, viewing their two-legged friends as lifelong companions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why they conceal their sharp teeth and claws.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So touching... I can't help crying!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You uninstalls the Dog Language Translation Module from your Pangu Terminal and transmits the related data back to her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The translation module...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xuanyin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're so considerate, {PlayerName}. I'll go back and analyze the data. Goodbye, friend. Sobbing.
